ygData.subject: Re: Polished Mithril Torque
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Aye, there are many items that happen along like the Polished Mithril Torque.  I was hoping to obtain some Mithril arms while fighting Fire Giants in SolB.
ygData.messageBody:
>Ok who is the brains behind this item??
>I was looking through EQitems webpage and happened upon this item.

Aye, there are many items that happen along like the Polished Mithril
Torque. I was hoping to obtain some Mithril arms while fighting Fire
Giants in SolB. We bring down the proper mob that carries it, and I pray
that it has the arms. It does, and I'm given an option to loot it, and to
my horror clerics can't use it.. but Rogues can?!?

Sheesh, needless to say i was disappointed, and confused. If a cleric can
wear a Mithril Breastplate, why not let her wear the arms too?

-Aosinator Lightbringer
-Devout follower of Mithaniel Marr on The Rathe
